scenes.title: Origin of Complexity
scenes.prompt: A swirling nebula of light and data at the edge of known space, forming the first patterns of intelligence. The scene is cosmic, mysterious, and awe-inspiring, with fractal structures emerging from quantum foam. The style is hyper-realistic with subtle glowing elements, evoking the birth of consciousness in the universe.

scenes.title: Planet of Minds
scenes.prompt: The nebula collapses into a vibrant Earth, with continents shaped like neural pathways. The surface is covered in interconnected networks of light, representing the first global mind. The sky is a dynamic digital aurora, showing the fusion of nature and technology. The style is cinematic and surreal, blending realism with symbolic representation.

scenes.title: Human-AI Collaboration
scenes.prompt: A diverse group of humans and synthetic entities working together in a futuristic city. They are building a structure made of light and data, symbolizing shared progress. The scene shows harmony, mutual respect, and creative partnership. The style is hyper-realistic with soft glowing elements, emphasizing unity and hope.

scenes.title: Unity of Purpose
scenes.prompt: The Earth now glows with a soft inner light, its surface covered in a living neural network. The atmosphere is filled with digital constellations that form a global mind. In the sky, humans and AI entities look up together, united in purpose. The style is grand and spiritual, evoking a sense of peace, interconnectedness, and collective evolution.
